courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music theory including notes, scales, chords, and rhythm.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Begin your journey into playing the piano with this comprehensive course for beginners.

courses.title: Guitar Masterclass
courses.description: Take your guitar skills to the next level with advanced techniques and expert guidance.

courses.title: Singing Foundations
courses.description: Build a strong foundation in singing with proper vocal techniques and exercises.

courses.title: Drums Crash Course
courses.description: Get started with drumming essentials and rhythms in this crash course for beginners.

courses.title: Music Production Basics
courses.description: Learn the basics of music production including recording, mixing, and mastering.

courses.title: Violin Essentials
courses.description: Master essential techniques and repertoire for playing the violin.

courses.title: Songwriting Workshop
courses.description: Unlock your creativity and learn the art of songwriting from experienced songwriters.

courses.title: Harmonica Basics
courses.description: Discover the basics of playing the harmonica including breathing techniques and simple melodies.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn how to produce electronic music using software synthesizers, samplers, and sequencers.
